Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the restriction on certain facilities being located within a certain distance from cannabis storefronts
Summary: Restricts cannabis storefronts and premises from being located within 500 feet from a school and two hundred feet of a house of worship.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to further restricting cannabis storefronts from being located within five hundred feet of a school and two hundred feet of a house of worship if they are located in a mixed use building
